Fries my eyes. Netflix overrides your screen brightness and removes your blue light filter. Which makes it barely useable and I will most likely unsubscribe because of this. It doesn't go dark enough and people have been complaining about this "feature" and removing blue light filter for over 6 years with no change. Stop dictating how we use our own devices. Some of us actually NEED the blue light filter/eye saving mode to be able to use your services. Worst, physically painful change.

Keep in mind that a lot of positive reviews are just bots and not real people and Netflix sure has gotten greedy and the ads, I was meaning to come back but it doesn't seem worth it anymore. Many shows can be watched elsewhere too. I miss how it used to be. No ads and it was just better all around. A shame really.
